casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Kareem LEACH Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 29, 2016

Glenn W. Falk, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Laurie N. Feldman, special deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, *793165 Conn.App. 28, 138 A.3d 445 (2016), is denied.
